Detailed Description

Declaration of the component NameServer One nameserver instance exists in kaapiserver. To instanciate server part, the option 'nameserver.start.true' should be set to 'yes', otherwise the client part is created into the process using NS. The identificator of the name server is given by 'nameserver.gid'. The data base of the name server could be dumped on demand:

  • if the nameserver receives the SIGINT or SIGTERM, then the process dumps the data base in the file located in <nameserver.rootdir>/db.rc, then it call the default signal handler (terminaison except if it was caught).
  • if the nameserver receives the SIGHUP, then the process dumps the data base without calling the default handler.
